title: Ep 22: Earnings Season Starts Off With A Bang
itunes:title: Earnings Season Starts Off With A Bang
description:
Jeff Clark, expert trader and editor of the S&A Short 
Report newsletter sees a major correction on the horizon. Rich Suttmeier, chief 
market strategist at ValuEngine.com explains the huge rally in banks.....And why 
it may be short-lived.
content:encoded:

market strategist at ValuEngine.com explains the huge rally in banks.....And why 
it may be short-lived.
